nodes.text: TK-529, also known as "Grimes" among its comrades, was a stormtrooper stationed on Hockaleg with a garrison during the Galactic Civil War. His job was to oversee the workers for the super weapon Tarkin, which is under construction over the planet. During his service, he heard of Darth Vader's presence on the space station and reported to his comrade TK-813, who in turn relayed it to veteran CT-4981. As the station exploded due to a rebel alliance sabotage, the workers on the planet turned on the Imperial occupation forces and killed all the soldiers in the garrison, including TK-529.
